description.value:
Requirements You are wielding two melee weapons, each in a different hand.

You use an attack with one weapon to distract your foe from a second attack coming at a different angle. Make one Strike with each of your two melee weapons, both against the same target. The target is automatically @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] against the second attack. Apply your multiple attack penalty to the Strikes normally.
